cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Standard Single Private Ensuite
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Rate is for 1 person on business only. No meals included. Maximum occupancy 1. Bedding config 1 Q. Private ensuite. TV.. Atherton Town Centre 1.7 kms from ABG. Mobile phone reception.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
